mapper.select: SELECT T1.MENU_NO, T1.MENU_URL, T1.P_MENU_CD, T1.MENU_CD, T1.MENU_NAME, T1.MENU_URL, T1.MENU_LEVEL, T1.MODULE_TYPE, T1.LEARNING_TYPE, T1.USE_YN, T1.MENU_ORDER, T1.LANGUAGE_CODE, (SELECT MAX(MODULE_ID) FROM XBT_BASELINE_EDU_DATE WHERE MENU_CD = T1.MENU_CD) AS MODULE_ID FROM XBT_STU_MENU T1 WHERE T1.LANGUAGE_CODE = #{languageCode} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT T1.MENU_NO, T1.MENU_URL, T1.P_MENU_CD, T1.MENU_CD, T1.MENU_NAME, T1.MENU_URL, T1.MENU_LEVEL, T1.MODULE_TYPE, T1.LEARNING_TYPE, T1.USE_YN, T1.MENU_ORDER, T1.LANGUAGE_CODE, (SELECT MAX(MODULE_ID) FROM XBT_BASELINE_EDU_DATE WHERE MENU_CD = T1.MENU_CD) AS MODULE_ID FROM XBT_STU_MENU T1 WHERE T1.LANGUAGE_CODE = #{languageCode} AND T1.MENU_CD = #{menuCd}
SELECT '' AS moduleId, '' AS moduleNm, MENU_CD, MENU_NAME, MODULE_TYPE, LEARNING_TYPE FROM XBT_STU_MENU T1 WHERE LANGUAGE_CODE = 'kr' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY P_MENU_CD, MENU_ORDER ASC

SELECT PROC_CD, PROC_YEAR, PROC_SEQ, EDU_CODE, EDU_NAME, USER_ID, USER_NM, PROC_NM, COMP_NM, DEPT_NM, GAIN_SCORE, PRACTICE_SCORE, PRACTICE_YN, THEORY_SCORE, THEORY_YN, EVALUATION_SCORE, EVALUATION_YN, PASS_YN, ENDING_PROCESS_DATE, EDU_START_DATE, EDU_END_DATE, ENDING_YN FROM XBT_BASELINE_STUDENT_INFO WHERE ENDING_YN = 'N' OR ENDING_YN = 'ING'
SELECT USER_ID ,IFNULL(GAIN_SCORE, 0)AS gainScore FROM XBT_BASELINE_THEORY WHERE PROC_CD = #{procCd} AND USER_ID = #{userId} and END_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY TRY_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT USER_ID ,IFNULL(GAIN_SCORE, 0)AS gainScore FROM XBT_BASELINE_EVALUATION WHERE PROC_CD = #{procCd} AND USER_ID = #{userId} AND END_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY TRY_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT USER_ID , IFNULL(PRACTICE_SCORE, 0)AS practiceScore, IFNULL(PRACTICE_CAR_SCORE, 0)AS practiceCarScore, IFNULL(PRACTICE_HUMAN_SCORE, 0)AS practiceHumanScore FROM XBT_BASELINE_STUDENT_INFO WHERE PROC_CD = #{procCd} AND USER_ID = #{userId} AND PRACTICE_YN = 'Y' LIMIT 1

choose.when: UPDATE XBT_BASELINE_STUDENT_INFO SET THEORY_YN = 'Y', THEORY_SCORE = #{theoryScore}, UPDATE_DATE = now(), UPDATE_ID = 'system' WHERE PROC_CD = #{procCd} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE XBT_BASELINE_STUDENT_INFO SET EVALUATION_YN = 'Y', EVALUATION_SCORE = #{evaluationScore}, UPDATE_DATE = now(), UPDATE_ID = 'system' WHERE PROC_CD = #{procCd} AND USER_ID = #{userId}

mapper.select: SELECT THEORY_YN, EVALUATION_YN, PRACTICE_YN FROM XBT_BASELINE_STUDENT_INFO WHERE PROC_CD = #{procCd} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.update:
UPDATE XBT_BASELINE_STUDENT_INFO SET
GAIN_SCORE = #{gainScore}, ENDING_YN = 'Y', PASS_YN = #{passYn}, ENDING_PROCESS_DATE = now(),
GAIN_SCORE = #{gainScore}, ENDING_YN = 'Y', PASS_YN = #{passYn}, ENDING_PROCESS_DATE = null,
UPDATE_DATE = now(), UPDATE_ID = 'system' WHERE PROC_CD = #{procCd} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE XBT_BASELINE_STUDENT_INFO SET ENDING_YN = 'Y' WHERE ENDING_YN = 'N' AND date_format(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') > EDU_END_DATE
